8.13.21

Of the 23 included studies, Snowball was only able to stage 16. The 16 staged references yielded 254 snowballed references. 
Scopus will only search up to ~120 DOIs at once, so i split the SnowGlobe export into 2 sets, searched each set in Scopus, then combined them with OR to retrieve a total of 203 results. 

Refs without DOIs were not searched.
